name: Trapped | A 100% Pen Scrolling Platformer
description:
▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

▢      =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-TRAPPED-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=       ▢

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

❏ Arrow, Keys, WASD, or Mobile to Move

❏ R to Reset to last Checkpoint/Beginning

❏ Q & R to fully Restart Level (Time Resets)

❏ Select Settings to swap to Mobile Mode

❏ Can you get a World Record for one of the Levels!?

❏ In Level Select click Left when you're on Level 1 to Exit

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

▢     =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-STORY-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=      ▢

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

You were once a free Square, and then you fell into a hole... down... down... down... down... down... down... 

When you landed, you took a look around...

You're TRAPPED!!!

You have to Escape!!! 

But there seems to be something odd about this place...*

*more info in "tips"! ;)

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

▢     =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-TIPS-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=    ▢

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢

- Ground/Danger/Bounce Pads may disappear/appear!!

- Danger may be FAKE!! :OOOO

- If you fall off the screen you'll be returned to the top, and fall down again!! :OOOOOOO

If you fall off the screen 3 times you'll die though :( 

[ Use to your advantage to get records ;) ]

▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢▢
